scripts.release: NPM_TOKEN="$(npx --yes dotenv-cli -p NPM_TOKEN)" GH_TOKEN="$(npx --yes dotenv-cli -p GITHUB_TOKEN)" GIT_AUTHOR_NAME="$(npx --yes dotenv-cli -p GIT_AUTHOR_NAME)" GIT_COMMITTER_NAME="$(npx --yes dotenv-cli -p GIT_COMMITTER_NAME)" GIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL="$(npx --yes dotenv-cli -p GIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL)" GIT_COMMITTER_EMAIL="$(npx --yes dotenv-cli -p GIT_COMMITTER_EMAIL)" npx --no-install semantic-release --no-ci --extends "$(pwd)/release.config.cjs"
